targets.query: SELECT mean("demand") FROM "eagle" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("GriPwr") FROM "smawebbox.plant_overview" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("tempf") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("humidity") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("tempf") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("humidity") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("tempf") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("tempf") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("co2") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("co2") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("co2") FROM "netatmo.module" WHERE "type" = 'NAModule4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("target_F") FROM "nest.thermostat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("pooltemp") FROM "autelis" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("price_last") FROM "finance.currencies" WHERE "symbol" = 'EURUSD' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "tag"
SELECT mean("price_last") FROM "finance.stockquotes" WHERE "symbol" = 'TDC' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("count") FROM "usgs.earthquake.metadata" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("mag") FROM "usgs.earthquake.feature" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count("tracer_count") FROM "tracer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
